title: Communication Competency Enhancement Program for Healthcare Professionals in the Digital Age

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic medical terminology and clinical workflows
context.additional_context: A corporate in-house training program for medical device companies, combining asynchronous collaboration using digital devices (tablets/laptops) with periodic face-to-face sessions in a blended learning environment

learning_goals: Learners can apply empathetic communication skills with over 80% accuracy through patient-doctor role-play simulations.
Learners can successfully execute effective questioning strategies at least three times during small-group discussions analyzing real clinical cases.
Learners can improve communication plans based on peer feedback and achieve over 90% participation in final presentations.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
